GET /api.description: Responds with a JSON object of all the available endpoints of the api, with a description of what it will return and an example response

GET /api/topics.description: Responds with an object containing an array of all the topics

topics.description: Code is love, code is life
Hey good looking, what you got cooking?

GET /api/articles.description: Responds with an object containing array of all the articles. Can filter by topic (/api/articles?topic=cats), can be sorted by columns(/api/articles?sort_by=title),can be ordered by asc or desc(/api/articles?order=desc)

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Responds with an article object with the article_id passed in (must be an interger)

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Responds with an object containing an array of comments for the article_id(must be an interger) passed in

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: responds with the newly posted comment object (must pass an existing author), example body and response below

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Responds with the updated article with the new vote count passed in (must be an interger) example body(updatedVotes)

exampleResponse.title: Moustache
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.body: Have you seen the size of that thing?

GET /api/users.description: Responds with an array of user objects

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Responds with a status code of 204 no content once the comment has been deleted(comment_id must be an interger)

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Responds with the updatedComment object with the votes property updated by the number passed exmple body(updatedVotes)

exampleResponse.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles.description: Responds  with the newly created article (newArticle must have the correct properties)

newArticle.author: rogersop
newArticle.title: The maiden voyage
newArticle.body: The first trip of rogers vessel

exampleResponse.author: rogersop
exampleResponse.title: The maiden voyage
exampleResponse.body: The first trip of rogers vessel

POST /api/topics.description: Responds with the newly created topic object example body(newTopic)

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id.description: Responds with a status code of 204 no content once the article has been deleted(article_id must be an interger)
